title: Did Rajasthan CM Gehlot Really Say ‘UPA Govt’s End is Definite’?
subtitle: A viral video on social media claims that Rajasthan Chief Minister Ashok Gehlot said that the end of UPA government is definite.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
It is true that Ashok Gehlot, while talking to the press said that UPA government is definitely going to end and NDA government will come to power for sure. But it was a slip of tongue as seen in the original video of the press conference.

At 0:40 seconds, it can be clearly seen that he realised his mistake and rectified it by saying, “ UPA government ka aana nishchit hai aur jo maha gathbandhan ho raha hai, vo buhut shaandaar tarikey se ho raha hai. Buhut acchi meeting ho rahi hai. Ek meeting ho chuki hai. Sabka sankalp hai ki jo NDA government hai, inka ravaiya jo hai, vishesh roop se do log raaj kar rahe hain – Modi ji aur Amit Shah ji. BJP ka raaj nhi hai desh ke andar.” (Translated: It is certain that the UPA government will come to power and the establishment of maha gathbandhan is in full form. A meeting has been done regarding the same. Everybody is determined that the NDA government is primarily being ruled by two people – Modi ji and Amit Shah ji. BJP has no role to play in the country.)
